hero.chatWelcome: Hello! I'm Jaqueline Gonzaga, a Senior Mobile Developer specialized in React Native and accessibility. Ask me about my experiences, projects, technologies, or accessibility!
hero.chatSubtitle: Ask me about my professional experience

about.title: Me
about.description1: Senior Mobile Developer with 6+ years of experience building accessible, scalable, and high-performance applications for Android and iOS, specialized in React Native and modern frontend architectures. I design and implement robust mobile flows with a11y-first practices, ensuring WCAG-compliant experiences validated through TalkBack, VoiceOver, and end-to-end accessibility audits.
about.description2: Experienced in modular app architecture, secure storage, offline-first patterns, and performance optimization in complex design systems and multi-brand environments. Skilled in React Native, TypeScript, React, Redux/Zustand, GraphQL, REST, Jest/React Testing Library, Maestro E2E, CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Fastlane), and observability tools.
about.description3: I collaborate closely with product, design, QA, and cybersecurity teams to build maintainable codebases, scalable UI foundations, and reliable release pipelines. Skilled in diagnosing screen reader inconsistencies, resolving focus management issues, implementing semantic component libraries, and driving accessibility improvements that impact millions of users globally.
about.description4: I have experience across various domains including healthcare (appointments, benefits, wallets), fintech/digital wallet, logistics (truck flows, freight lifecycle), agritech (hydroponic management), retail (multilingual e-commerce), and investment/real estate dashboards. My approach combines technical expertise with a focus on accessibility, security, and user experience.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. If you have an interesting project, want to discuss technology, accessibility, or just exchange ideas, feel free to reach out!
